text: The 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 3 was a qualifying group for the 1990 FIFA World Cup. Soviet Union and Austria were the two teams that qualified. ==Results== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 8 4 3 1 11 4 +7 11 8 3 3 2 9 9 0 9 8 3 1 4 12 10 +2 7 8 3 1 4 9 13 –4 7 8 1 4 3 6 11 –5 6 ==Top Scorers== === 5 goals === * Toni Polster * Tanju Çolak === 4 goals === * Andreas Thom === 3 goals === * Hennadiy Lytovchenko * Oleh Protasov * Rıdvan Dilmen * Feyyaz Uçar Category:1990 FIFA World Cup qualification (UEFA)
title: 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 3
